title: Review of Ecclesiastical History
description: A Review of Ecclesiastical History, so far as it Concerns the Progress, Declension, and Revivals of Evangelical Doctrine and Practice ; with a Brief Account of the Spirit and Methods by which Vital and Experimental Religion Have Been Opposed in all Ages of the Church - Summary by Title Page
